posts.post_content: T206 Moose Grimshaw with Carolina Brights back. Card presents VG except for, of course, the paper loss on front. $SOLD dlvd via check, money order or paypal (gift or pmt owed). Thanks. Chris.
Even though it is sold, it would help the net54 members if the sale price was up. Any chance you'd put it back up?

[quote name="FrankWakefield" post=879916]Even though it is sold, it would help the net54 members if the sale price was up. Any chance you'd put it back up?[/QUOTE]

Sometimes when folks don't want to be too public, a Private Message can work...certainly up to the seller if he/she ever wants to divulge anything...
